name: EE_Fixpack
description: The Enhanced Edition Fixpack is an unofficial collection of fixes for the Enhanced Editions of Baldur's Gate, Baldur's Gate II, Icewind Dale, and Planescape: Torment.

name: cks-dtrace
description: DTrace scripts we use at CSLab

name: dox
description: Notes and cheat sheets on various topics

name: Scales_of_Balance
description: a tweak mod and kit pack for BG2/TOB, BGEE, BG2EE, and IWDEE

name: BG2-Fixpack
description: The BG2 Fixpack is an ongoing project to finally fix the last remaining bugs and errors left after numerous official patches and unofficial fixpacks in Baldur's Gate 2 and Throne of Bhaal.

name: NPC_EE
description: NPC kit options for Baldur's Gate

name: UnfinishedBusiness
description: This is a game mod for the game Baldur's Gate 2, which aims to finish dangling plots, clean up loose ends and un-dummy dummied out content.

name: Faiths_and_Powers
description: Faiths and Powers mod

name: SandrahEET
description: Part 1 of Sandrah Saga for EET

name: WheelsOfProphecy
description: Wheels of Prophecy is a mod for Baldur's Gate II original or the Enhanced Edition. Wheels of Prophecy is a smallish mod that tries to add a bit more nonlinearity and roleplaying opportunity to the Throne of Bhaal expansion, mostly but not entirely centered around chapter nine.  In summary, Wheels of Prophecy doesn't change the events of Throne of Bhaal (not much, anyway), but it does let the player interact with them in a much more flexible way.

name: A7-TotLM-BG2EE
description: The Icewind Dale expansion "Trials of the Luremaster" made available to BG2:EE and EET

name: Item_Upgrade
description: The Item Upgrade Mod Pack allows Cromwell and Cespenar to upgrade more items for you. Half of them are conveniences, the other half try to prop up weapon categories that are "weak" by comparison (e.g., maces and clubs).

name: SoD-to-BG2EE-Item-Upgrade
description: Imports more Siege of Dragonspear items into logical (to me at least) locations in BG2:EE during the Shadows of Amn campaign. They are attainable in a variety of ways – quest rewards, drops from enemies killed, shops, and containers.

name: BG_Quests_And_Encounters
description: Quest Mod for BG1(TotSC), Baldur's Gate Trilogy, Tutu, BG:EE, and EET

name: A7-BagsOfTorment
description: A mod for PST:EE that adds a number of container items to the game.

name: BS_Baldurans_Seatower
description: Quest mod that adds a new district and lots of quests to the city of Badur's Gate!

name: dtrace-scripts
description: A collection of DTrace scripts

name: A7-Achievements
description: A mod for all Enhanced Edition games that makes Steam Achievements available as regular journal entries for everyone.

name: FishingForTrouble
description: A mod by Yovaneth's with EE and EET support

name: lilith-multipass-modula2-compiler
description: Historic multipass Modula-2 compiler for the Lilith architecture, developed by a team under the direction of Niklaus Wirth at the Institut für Informatik at ETH Zürich

name: Undivided
description: A mod for Planescape: Torment

name: thalan
description: Thalantyr Item Upgrade mod, compatible with EET, BG:EE and SoD.

name: msfm
description: More Style for Mages - A mod for BG:EE, BG2:EE and IWD:EE

name: Branwen_for_BGII
description: A playable modding tutorial NPC mod for BGII!

name: PowerOfBelief
description: Allowing the Nameless One to become a Priest in PSTEE

name: Region_of_Terror
description: The mod is based on the adventures of Drizzt Do'Urden. puts in Drizzt and his companions as playable NPC's and you'll be able to play with him through the old and new quests. The mod contains several new big quests and adds in four new cities/villages/towns.

name: NTotSC
description: NTotSC v2.x.y for BGT, BG:EE, and EET

name: EndlessBG1
description: Remain in BG1 after Sarevok's Fall - with more Content inspired by Siege of Dragonspear! A Mod for BG:EE, BG:SoD, BGT, and EET!

name: Shadows_over_Soubar
description: In a nutshell, Shadows Over Soubar is another large mod made by CBisson, adding many new quests, characters and areas to the game. The player travels to the town of Soubar, where the Bhaalspawn's powers are sorely needed.

name: NPC_Dusk_MOD
description: Dusk NPC MOD for Baldur's Gate II

name: CowledMenace
description: Unravel the mysteries of the Twisted Rune and investigate the Cowled Wizards in this Enhanced Edition Trilogy mod!

name: SandrahToT
description: Part 3 of Sandrah Saga

name: RuadRofhessaItemUpgrade
description: Ruad is a smith who improves items as well as forges some quite new items. You find him in the west of Waukeens Promenade on top on the wall.

name: Tactics-Remix
description: Tactics Remix adds quite a few optional, but difficult, encounters to BG2:EE and EET aimed to make the game more challenging and rewarding.

name: Xan_for_BGII
description: Adds Xan as joinable NPC to Baldur's Gate II!

name: BP_in_BG
description: Black pits in BGEE

name: Check_the_Bodies
description: This mod adds various quests to the BGII part of the game, including new areas, a new city, spells, stores, animations, and items: This is a mini-quest mod, each single quest works as a stand alone quest.

name: The_Calling
description: The Calling really started as a collection of random questions from BG--why didn't anyone take over the gnoll stronghold, considering the two bordering nations are on the brink of war? Why are the only class-specific quests in the game with Narlen Darkwalk? Why isn't Melicamp used more?

name: MadeInHeaven_ItemPack
description: My item pack for BG2, BGT and BG(2)EE.  Adds over a hundred new items to Baldur's Gate 1 and Baldur's Gate 2.

name: Corwin
description: Corwin extension for EET

name: HTaM
description: "Heroes, Thieves and Moneylenders" mod

name: Kivan_and_Deheriana
description: This is a WeiDU mod which adds a joinable NPC from BG1, Kivan, and under certain circumstances, his elven wife, Deheriana, to the cast of BG2 actors.

name: Crucible
description: This is a quest mod expanding on the ToB ending.

name: SandrahRtF
description: Part 2 of Sandrah Saga

name: Will_to_Power
description: A 2E-inspired psionics mod for BGEE/SoD/BG2EE/IWDEE

name: Almaterias_Restoration_Project
description: The younger, brasher sidekick of Unfinished Business for Baldur's Gate II.

name: transitions
description: Mod to smooth out transitions between Baldur's Gate campaigns and to allow continued play after boss enemies have been defeated

name: Eve-Of-War
description: This is an extensive mod that makes changes to the main quest of Baldur’s Gate Enhanced Edition. It offers components that incorporates sourcebook material into the game - making it more in line with what sourcebooks like Volo’s Guide to the Sword Coast and Lands of Intrigue have to say about these areas.  It also provides additional areas and joinable NPCs and has components that make rule changes.

name: Back_to_Brynnlaw
description: A Questmod for Baldur's Gate II (BGII, BGT, BGII:EE, EET)

name: NPC_Flirt_Packs
description: Adds flirst and player initiated dialogues to the BGII BioWare romances!

name: LongerRoadEE
description: The Longer Road mod allows you to restore your main adversary from the SoA portion of the game back to life, and take him into the party to fight on your side.

name: ImprovedAnvil
description: Improved Anvil, a mod for BG2:EE

name: gorgon
description: A mod for BG:EE that adds a thieves guild into the town of Beregost.

name: dtrace-tools
description: DTrace-based tools for OS X

name: Edwin_Romance
description: This is a Baldur's Gate II mod that allows the player to carry out a romantic relationship with Edwin Odesseiron, the Red Wizard of Thay. It also offers a less tragic epilogue for romanced and redeemed Viconia.

name: Banter_Pack
description: Adds Banters to the BioWare NPCs of Baldur's Gate II!

name: arestorationp
description: Almateria's Restoration Project

name: MinscFriendship
description: This mod adds a series of dialogues with Minsc.

name: Indira_NPC
description: The Indira One-Day NPC for BG. Indira is a half-elven, lawful good fighter/mage from an area just east of the Baldur's Gate region. She has banters with all BG1 NPCs except Branwen, Coran, Ajantis, Faldorn, and Skie, for a grand total of 20... I think.

name: Jasteys_SoD_Tweakpack
description: Jastey's SoD related tweaks, for SoD, EET, or even BGT.

name: Road_To_Discovery_for_SoD
description: Connect the SoD Story Dots: make PC and officers aware and talk about the crusade's real purpose! Tracks the PC's knowledge and improves the officers' reaction about Caelar's plans!

name: Sirene-NPC
description: Sirene NPC mod for BG:EE

name: Alora-NPC-for-BG2
description: This mod brings Alora, the halfling thief, from Baldur's Gate to Baldur's Gate II. She can be found in Ribald's store

name: Sellswords
description: A Quest Mod for Baldur's Gate II (BGII, BGT, BGII:EE, EET)!

name: Ascalons_Questpack
description: Adds several small quests to BG1 and BGII. For BGT, Tutu, BG:EE, BGII, BGII:EE, and EET.

name: freebsd-dtrace-tools
description: Collection of FreeBSD compatible DTrace scripts

name: framed
description: Mod for BG1EE and EET that adds an alternative chapter 6 and allows Candlekeep to be a side quest.

name: Solaufeins_Rescue_NPC
description: Makes Solaufein, the Ust Natha Drow from BGII a joinable NPC and adds a quest in the Underdark.

name: Grey_The_Dog
description: Grey is a dog NPC for Baldur's Gate!

name: Romantic_Encounters_BG2
description: he Romantic Encounters mod for Baldur's Gate II (RE for short) is an add-on for the game Baldur's Gate II. Romantic possibilities are endless. It could be a bit of flirting. Or several. Some innuendo. A lovers' quarrel. A one-night stand. Or even several nights together - with a 'morning after' and without. A dream. Or something else?

name: TDDz
description: A tool which allows "The Darkest Day" to be installed on Baldur's Gate II: Enhanced Edition

name: Aran-Whitehand
description: NPC Modification for Baldurs Gate: Shadows of Amn & Throne of Bhaal using WeiDU.  Please use WeiDU v238 or above to install this mod.

name: StuffofTheMagi
description: This mod adds the Stuff of the Magi set to several creatures

name: dtrace-tools
description: DTrace scripts for binaries that support DTrace Dynamic Tracing.

name: Caelar
description: Allow an alternate solution with Cealar in SoD. Caelar becomes joinable in ToB.

name: SubtleD_Spell_Tweaks
description: a buncha random small tweaks for BGEE etc.

name: A7-GolemConstruction
description: A mod for BG:EE and BG2:EE that allows spellcasters to build their own golems

name: TomeAndBlood
description: Tome And Blood: Expanded Options for the Arcane Classes.

name: Imoen4Ever
description: Experience the BG Saga with Imoen - and the beginning of SoA without pressure!

name: AurenAseph
description: Auren Aseph is a young and eager fighter from Beregost. She was born to a middle class merchant and his wife, and grew up a headstrong girl. Her father would tell her stories of adventurers he'd run into while on his caravan routes, and Auren became more and more interested at the thought of adventuring as she got older. She'd spend hours every week at the famous blacksmith Thunderhammer's shop, staring at all of the many types of weapons and armor, both magical and non-magical. Her desire to explore the world and independent nature was quickly noticed when she was thirteen, when the leader of a group of adventurers passing through town saw her eavesdropping on their conversations at Feldpost's Inn.

name: Adrian_NPC
description: Adrian Sianodel can be found in Irenicus' Dungeon. He is lawful evil half-elven sorcerer NPC, whose world view is influenced by some very dark philosophy, but he isn't a monster.

name: Finch_NPC
description: An NPC Mod for Baldur's Gate (Tutu, BGT, BG:EE, EET)

name: Black-Hearts-BG1
description: For Black Hearts for BG:EE

name: BGEE-Caster-Crafting
description: Mod for Infinity Engine games that introduces crafting (scrolls, potions, wands) for casters (mage, cleric, druid, etc.)

name: Arath_NPC
description: This mod for BGII adds Arath, a complex, self-assured, humorous and somewhat hedonistic, romanceable druid NPC.

name: Xan_BG1_Friendship
description: This mod provides a friendship path for Xan NPC in Baldur's Gate I.

name: Bank_of_Baldurs_Gate
description: This mod adds a bank in Baldur's Gate City, near the Iron Throne Headquarters. After opening an account, you can deposit and withdraw your money whenever you want.

name: Darron
description: Darron is a salesman in the cellar of the shadow thieves guild and sells new objects created especially for thieves.

name: SkitiaNPCs
description: Skitias NPCs for Baludr's Gate 2

name: LCA
description: Repository for the Love Conquers All Mod for Baldur's Gate Enhanced Edition Trilogy. Crossmodding is allowed! Forking is allowed as well, pursuant to the MIT license.

name: Beyond_the_Law
description: This mod lights up the unusual relationship between two people who cannot be more differently: Kova, a magician/thief with an unsavory background and a good heart, and Kiyone, a law-enforcing archer. The mod points out more about the power play between the Shadow Thieves and the Cowled Wizards in Athkatla, and why certain things happened to certain NPCs. Kova and Kiyone appear only if the player is either good or neutrally aligned and the reputation of the player is more than 12.

name: g3anniversary
description: The G3 Anniversary Mod is a collaborative effort of a lot of the resident G3 modders and marks not only a celebration of our first year but our gratitude to you for helping make G3 what it is today. This is a WeiDU mod for Baldur's Gate II that adds one long quest to the Shadows of Amn portion of the game.

name: Rolles
description: A new smith in Waukeen's Promenade above the entrance to the Adventurer's Market.

name: Drizzt-Saga
description: The mod brings Drizzt and company into the game with their own major quest, also side quests & new areas, items (some to be forged) and new creatures.

name: themed_tweaks
description: This mod main purpose is to augment the role-playing environment throughout the game series. To that end, it tweaks the storyline in various places.

name: Kiara-Zaiya
description: This mod introduces two joinable NPCs, Zaiya and Kiara, to your game. Zaiya is a Chaotic Good half-elven wild mage, and Kiara is a Neutral Evil human monk. Zaiya can be found inside the slaver ship (Slums District) and will join your party only if your character is of either good or neutral alignment.

name: IWD2_NPC_Project
description: The IWD2 NPC mod is a fan-made modification put together for fun, and not for profit. So, don't try to sell it. Two games in particular provided the major source of inspiration for this mod: Baldur's Gate II and Knights of the Old Republic. BioWare developed both of those excellent games.

name: Ninde_NPC
description: Lady Ninde Amblecrown, the evil Necromancer with a tongue like a guillotine, formidable magical skill and a matching ego, can be found in Bodhi's lair only if the PC sides with Aran Linvail. Her romance boasts some more mature content.

name: Tiax_for_BGII
description: An NPC mod for Baldur's Gate II (BGII, BGT, BGII:EE, EET)!

name: valen
description: Valen Mod Port For Enhanced Edition of Baldur's Gate II

name: HaerdalisFriendship
description: This mod adds a series of dialogues with Haer'dalis.

name: customs
description: Sword Coast Customs

name: Bolsa
description: This mod adds Bolsa, a new merchant who sells several containers and a very useful Staff of the Magi in the Five Flagons Inn (2nd Floor).

name: The_Boareskyr_Bridge_Scene
description: A mod for Siege of Dragonspear that gives more impact to the important scene at Boareskyr Bridge.

name: Fading_Promises
description: This Baldur's Gate II mod adds a quest and a series of encounters with a talkative ghost, Aidan, a fallen paladin of Amaunator.

name: Yeslick_NPC
description: This mod brings Yeslick from Baldur's Gate to BGII: SoA and ToB, with an extensive variety of banters and interjections, a new kit (Alaghor of Clangeddin) as well as a number of PC dialogues throughout the game.

name: bg2-wildmage
description: Wild Mage additions mod for Baldur's Gate 2

name: Nalia_At_Last
description: A Standalone Nalia Romance for ToB with a Romance Branch to continue a romance from De'Arnise Romance or Arnel's Nalia Romance

name: Assassinations
description: A Questmod for Baldur's Gate II (BGII, BGT, BGII:EE, EET)

name: Expanded_Thief_Stronghold
description: This mod expands the thief stronghold to make it more interesting by adding new quests and importing Narlen Darkwalk and Black Lilly from the Baldur's Gate Shadow Thieves guild into Athkatla.

name: dtracetools
description: DTrace scripts for SmartOS zones

name: bg2-npcmod-lena
description: a Baldur's Gate 2 NPC Mod - Lena, a warrior with a custom kit

name: CompassOfWomanhood
description: Mod project for Baldur's Gate II: Enhanced Edition

name: Arnel-Nalia-Romance-Revision
description: This mod adds a complete romance with Nalia, including the tree of life dialogs, beloved one in danger, Nalia's abduction by Bodhi, and other love related quests. It also adds some new quests and character interactions. We strongly recommend having Minsc in the party.

name: Another_Fine_Hell
description: Another more ingame reason for the PC's fall at the end of SoD!

name: mod-translation-imoen-romance
description: Перевод мода Imoen Romance

name: A7-TestYourMettle
description: A mod for BG2:EE and EET that provides you with a unique dungeon crawling experience.

name: A7-ChaosSorcerer
description: A mod for BG:EE, BG2:EE and IWD:EE that introduces the new kit Chaos Sorcerer.

name: Iylos_NPC
description: This mod adds the joinable monk Iylos Mirdan to the ToB part of Baldur's Gate II (BGII, BGT, BGII:EE, EET).

name: A7-NPCGenerator
description: Install your own pregenerated or exported characters as regular NPCs.

name: deArnise_Romance
description: An NPC mod for Baldur's Gate II (BGII, BGT, BGII:EE, EET)!

name: Reunion
description: A Questmod for BG2:ToB!

name: Turnabout
description: Summon old friends for the final ToB battle! Ascension mod required.

name: HoW_EET
description: Mod Heart of Winter for BGEE / EET

name: SNU_2D_ProgrammingTools_IDE_DTrace
description: The DTrace Programming language IDE submodule for SNU Programming Tools (2D Mode)

name: RTT-ItemPack
description: 51 new magic items to Ribald's Special Store.

name: Ascalons_Breagar
description: Adds a dwarven NPC to the whole BG saga.

name: Tamoko
description: Sarevok's former lover as joinable NPC at BG1 end and during SoD - the transition from BG1 to SoD can be controlled by the player.

name: IWD_EET_Integration
description: Proper dual-classing rules for BG/BG2/IWDEE

name: Dungeon_Crawl
description: A Quest Mod for Baldur's Gate II (BGII, BGT, BGII:EE, EET)!

name: 7c-yoshi
description: Keeping Yoshimo mod for Baldur's Gate II.

name: KorganFriendship
description: This mod adds a series of dialogues with Korgan.

name: Alternatives
description: Alternatives offers two new possibilities to consider when making the decision about whether to side with the Shadow Thieves or with Valen's Mistress. In addition to the traditional two, the player may now opt to side with a group even the paladins in the party could have no objection to... or he may opt to skip the whole decision entirely and set sail for Maztica.  Alternatives also offers a different way to satisfy Mae Var's demand that the protagonist steal an artifact from a temple and an alternate way to complete the Riddle of the Sewers. https://www.gibberlings3.net/mods/quests/alternatives/

name: Silver_Star_NPC
description: This mod adds an elven neutral evil assassin who can first join the party in Irenicus' lovely underground hole. Silver Star is partially insane and chronically poisoned. She has crude and cruel dialogues, and banters with NPCs in SoA, but not in ToB.

name: dtrace-lamp
description: DTrace scripts for LAMP platforms that support DTrace Dynamic Tracing.

name: hackintosh
description: for msi ge60 2pl 403xcn

name: Bajaj-Finserv-Hackathon
description: HealthRX app

name: 7c-galileo
description: Galileo, a Halfling Jester NPC for BGT, Tutu, EET and BG:EE.

name: ExtraExpandedEnhancedEncounters
description: Extra Expanded Enhanced Encounters! (for BGEE/EET)

name: DrizztSaga
description: Drizzt Saga for BG2EE and EET

name: Anishai
description: From Barren Fischa: This is my small contribution to JCompton's one-day NPC project. It makes Anishai, the monk from Mae'Var's guildhouse, a joinable NPC.

name: Haldamir
description: The mod adds an elven fighter to BG2, BGT, BGII:EE, or EET. Haldamir can be found inside the Den of the Seven Vales in Waukeen's Promenade.

name: BaeBG2
description: Baeloth in BG2EE

name: DarkHorizons
description: Dark Horizons, quests and npcs.

name: YasraenaEET
description: A good female drow in search of her lover, an elf

name: Nephele_NPC
description: Adding a touch of humour and hopefully a hint of originality and interest, Nephele is a new NPC for BGII: SoA and ToB--a halfling cleric of Yondalla, mother of seven and a compulsive adventurer.

name: Keto
description: Keto is an NPC mod for Baldur's Gate 2.

name: Balduran-s-Sea-Tower
description: The tower in the harbour of Baldur's Gate has a number of new quests waiting.

name: Solaufein
description: Weimer's classic mod changes Solaufein into a joinable NPC for BG2EE and ToB. Revised EE version.

name: Murneth
description: This mod adds a new NPC to the Baldur's Gate portion of either of the conversions, Baldur's Gate Tutu or BGT-WeiDU, or Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition.

name: Ascension
description: BG2 Ascension Mod Update for Enhanced Edition

name: Solaufein_Flirt_Pack
description: This Mod does nothing more than add a bit of extra content to Weimer's excellent Solaufein Romance Mod.

name: Isra_NPC
description: This mod adds Isra Ghadir, a young paladin of Sune Firehair, to Baldur's Gate. You can find her in the Nashkel Mines region, trying (with no success whatsoever) to resolve Prism's legal difficulties

name: The_Luxley_Family
description: This mod introduces two joinable NPCs, Sebastian and Andrei Luxley, to your game. They can be found in the Bridge District of Athkatla. They both have detailed talk tracks with the PC; they also banter with each other extensively throughout the game. New areas, voicing...

name: Keldorn_Romance
description: This mod adds a romance for female PCs and a quest for Keldorn.

name: Emily-BG1
description: Emily NPC BG1 Content

name: ValygarFriendship
description: This mod adds a series of dialogues with Valygar.

name: KorgansRedemption
description: This mod provides the possibility of redeeming Korgan if Mazzy is in your party.

name: TheSlitheringMenace
description: This mod adds a small "quest" containing "an encounter of serpentine nature" on the pocket plane dimension, as well as a brand new (and stylish!) item.

name: AnimalCompanions
description: Animal Companions Mod for Rangers and Druids. For BG1 / BG2 / BGEE / BG2EE / EET / IWDEE / IWD

name: The_Jerry_Zinger_Show
description: This mod allows the PC and his companions to view (and take part in) the live talk show of Jerry Zinger, well known Amnish celebrity! Shows are daily, and executed largely by cutscenes.

name: CerndFriendship
description: This mod adds a series of dialogues with Cernd.

name: Helga-BG1
description: Helga's NPC Mod data for BG1

name: Fade_NPC
description: Adds Fade, a joinable NPC to Baldur's Gate II: Fade is a chaotic neutral Fey'ri (elven tiefling) Shadow Thief, and is romanceable by males of any race and alignment.

name: Miriam
description: Vampire Tales mod version for BG2EE + EET by arcanecoast.ru

name: Ajantis_BG1_Expansion
description: More content (dialogues, banters) for Ajantis in BG1!

name: m7tweaks
description: Convenience tweaks/cheats for BG2:ToB, BG2EE and EET

name: Eldritch_Magic
description: Kit Mod for BG:EE, BG2:EE, and IWD:EE

name: Valerie_NPC
description: This mod adds Valerie, a sorceress and member of the Cowled Wizards of Amn, sent to investigate the mines of Nashkel. It  contains a friendship for a PC of any race and gender with flirt opportunities for both genders that can be considered PG material.

name: Summon_Bhaalspawn
description: This mod that adds an extra NPC (Sandra) in a very interesting way.  It also acts as a template for those who wish to install a NPC in a new and interesting way.  Currently, Sandra has dialogue for joining and leaving, some very interesting banter dialog that might result in some special circumstances, a special surprise for Imoen, and a few Interjections done.
